mapper.select: select bw.*,t.time departureTime,l.name lineName,l.start_time,l.return_time,b.number,l.start_time+l.return_time+p.value all_time from tb_bus_work bw left join tb_time t on bw.time_id = t.id left join tb_line l on bw.line_id = l.id left join tb_bus b on bw.bus_id = b.id left join tb_param p on p.type_english = 'arriveSiteRest' where b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_bus_work (bus_id, line_id, time_id, start_begin_or_return, is_addup ) values (#{busId}, #{lineId}, #{timeId}, #{startBeginOrReturn}, #{isAddup} )
mapper.update:
update tb_bus_work
title = #{title},
is_carousel = #{isCarousel},
end_time = #{endTime},
state_id = #{stateId},
img_url = #{imgUrl},
advertiser_x = #{advertiserX},
advertiser_y = #{advertiserY},
where id = #{id}
